name: Frenetic Jungle
description:
🎈READ ME🎈

Hello everyone! I'm HBalloon and this is my first Game Jam!

The theme is TIME ⌚.

INSTRUCTIONS:

↕️  Move Mrs.Monkey, avoid bullets;

↔️ Move Mr.Mushroom, avoid bullets;

A-B Help Mr.Dog, when the pc is blue press the correct letter;

MENU Help Mrs. Cat, when the tv is red press the button.

Make sure to subscribe to my  Youtube channel and follow me on Instagram or my website  to see everything I'll post and I have already posted!
